getPropertyIdsByPlan

Overview

This method will return a list of property ids from a search string suggestion and list of categories; it uses BSGV2â€™s property search getPropertyIdListFromSuggestion method.

BSGv3 BSGv2 Show Additional Data Elements
No Yes

Request

Parameter Description Required
uid User ID Yes
sid Session ID Yes
op Operation Yes
searchString Search String Yes
